      (package private) DatanodeDescriptor DatanodeManager.getDatanodeDescriptor(String address)
      Given datanode address or host name, returns the DatanodeDescriptor for the same, or if it doesn't find the datanode, it looks for a machine local and then rack local datanode, if a rack local datanode is not possible either, it returns the DatanodeDescriptor of any random node in the cluster.
